svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: Gini Index around 2015 (1990-2015 countries) vs. Gini Index around 1990
Estimates are based on household survey data of either incomes or consumption. Countries are only shown where comparable
surveys falling within five years of each reference year were available.
Source: Povcal (2018), The Chartbook of Economic Inequality (2017), Kandor (2017) Table 1.B
